Articles.Content:
Hello all,

I had Kerbal Engineer working on my game, but then I made a new game and I can't get it to show my craft stats when on the launchpad. I tried reinstalling it but to no success. It even asks me if I'd like to check for updates when I start the game, so clearly something is working?

Anyhow, can anyone help me fix it? I need my suicide burn figures D:

Do you have the part installed on the craft? Or did you set the mod to display the stats without the part?

Is the button on stock toolbar blacked out? That would indicate the above two problems.
The latest versions reintroduced the need to have a part on your craft to get the data in Career mode. You can turn it off in the settings.
How do you change the settings? I really don't want to have to add a part given that I'm limited to 30 parts at the moment.
